meanings.definition: A class of phospholipids that are a major component of cell membranes.
meanings.sent1: Phosphatidylcholines help form the walls of cells.
meanings.sent3: When the phosphatidylcholines in the cell membrane throw a party, it's a lipid celebration!
meanings.sent4: The phosphatidylcholines in the cell membrane stand strong like the walls of a fortress.
meanings.sent5: Imagine the cell membrane as a mosaic of colorful phosphatidylcholines.

meanings.definition: Phospholipids containing choline as a head group.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the structure of phosphatidylcholines in the lab.
meanings.sent2: Choline is a key component of phosphatidylcholines.
meanings.sent3: The phosphatidylcholines with choline heads always lead the phospholipid parade.
meanings.sent4: The phosphatidylcholines with choline heads are like the captains of the phospholipid team.
meanings.sent5: The choline head of phosphatidylcholines is like a beacon guiding other molecules.
